options.name: Light Step
options.description: You move quietly and efficiently. Gain +1 skill with stealth. You can move at full speed while sneaking without penalty, and difficult terrain costs only 1 extra movement instead of double.

options.name: Action : Hit and Run
options.description: Make a ranged attack, then immediately move up to half your movement. This movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity from your target.

options.name: Reaction : Vanish
options.description: When you take damage, immediately attempt a stealth check to become obscured. You must have cover or concealment available. If successful, move up to 3 units.

options.name: Ambush Tactics
options.description: You excel at finding the perfect ambush spot. Gain +1 skill with senses. When attacking from obscured, your attacks deal +2 damage and you remain hidden if you move immediately after attacking.

options.name: Guerrilla Fighter
options.description: You excel at wilderness warfare. Gain +1 skill with wildcraft. In natural terrain, gain +1 die on stealth checks and can set simple traps during short rest. Traps deal 1d6 damage and alert you when triggered.

options.name: Mobile Archer
options.description: You maintain accuracy while moving. Gain +1 skill with fitness. You can make ranged attacks after running without penalty and your movement speed increases by 1 when not wearing heavy armor.

options.name: Action : Harrying Fire
options.description: Make a ranged attack against up to 3 different targets within range. Each target hit is impaired (cannot move) until the start of your next turn as they take cover from your barrage.

options.name: Master Sniper
options.description: Your precision with complex ranged weapons is legendary. Gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons. Your first attack each combat from obscured automatically gains maximum damage if it hits. Your optimal range increases by one category.

options.name: Master Ambusher
options.description: You are a ghost on the battlefield. Gain +1 skill with simple ranged weapons. When you attack from obscured, all other enemies must make a senses check (DC 10) or be unable to determine your location, even after you attack.

options.name: Ghost of the Battlefield
options.description: You become a phantom warrior. Gain +1 skill with stealth and +1 skill with evasion. Once per combat, for 1 minute: become obscured as a free action after moving 10+ units, ranged attacks don't break obscured if you move after, and enemies have -2 dice on attacks against you.
